title: Kylie Jenner ‘can’t wait’ to have more kids after Travis Scott split
text:
Kylie Jenner wants to have more babies a year after welcoming Stormi (Picture: YouTube)

Kylie Jenner can’t wait to have more babies, a year after welcoming daughter Stormi with Travis Scott.

The Lip Kit queen split with the Sicko Mode rapper earlier this month, but this hasn’t put her off giving their little one a sibling in the future.

Taking part in an Instagram Q&A session, the 22-year-old was asked if she was planning to add to her brood.

‘I can’t wait to have more babies, but not ready just yet,’ she replied.

Which is fair enough.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star also teased what she might be naming her next child.

Kylie Jenner ‘can’t wait’ for more kids (Picture: Instagram)

Kylie already has a name in mind for the little one (Picture: Instagram)

When questioned about other names she was considering for Stormi, she said: ‘Rose, I still love that name..’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Could we be blessed with a Rose Jenner at some point?

Elsewhere in the candid chat, Ky opened up about ‘getting back into shape’ after giving birth at the beginning of last year, explaining she ‘snapped back’ quickly but wasn’t confident with her body.

‘I snapped back pretty fast but it was never the same and still isn’t,’ she told a fan. ‘Once I accepted the change my confidence came back. It just takes time.’

Kylie and Travis Scott split earlier this month (Picture: FilmMagic)

And she got stretch marks ‘On my breasts, butt and thighs! I haven’t gotten rid of them.

‘Just accepted them as a little gift from Stormi lol.’

Kylie hasn’t had the easiest time of it recently, following her split from Travis after two-and-a-half years together.

She later hit out at claims she reunited with ex Tyga, after she was pictured making a late-night visit to the same hotel he happened to be recording new music at.

Taking to Twitter, she fumed: ‘The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is.

Kylie is believed to have hung out with Tyga (Picture: Getty)

‘There was no “2am date with Tyga”. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.

‘Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! Our friendship and our daughter is priority.’

And Travis was forced to address claims he was unfaithful to the reality star-turned businesswoman, amid speculation over his friendship with Rojean Kar (aka YungSweetRo).

Advertisement

Advertisement

Blasting speculation on Instagram, he wrote: ‘It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again,’ he told his 20.8million followers.

‘Once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real (sic).’

So that’s that, then.

description: Kylie Jenner ‘can’t wait’ to have more kids after Travis Scott split – and she already has name in mind
